thread.title_full: Lucasfilm shows off VR prototype for 'Star Wars' filmmaking - KBCI CBS 2 - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: KBCI CBS 2
title: Lucasfilm shows off VR prototype for 'Star Wars' filmmaking - KBCI CBS 2
text:
Before a planet in a galaxy far, far away is completely constructed inside a computer or entirely built somewhere in the real world, "Star Wars" filmmakers are now able to visit it in virtual reality before production commences. Rob Bredow, a Lucasfilm visual effects supervisor and head of the ILM Experience Lab, showed off a prototype program Wednesday at an industry gathering of VR creators.
 KBCI CBS 2.
